mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (p_id, p_cate, p_name, p_content, p_price, p_date)VALUES (seq_product_p_Id.NEXTVAL, #{p_Cate}, #{p_Name}, #{p_Content}, #{p_Price}, sysdate)
INSERT INTO product_image(p_id, i_ip, i_fname, i_fsize) VALUES(#{p_Id}, #{i_Ip}, #{i_Fname}, #{i_Fsize})
mapper.select: SELECT P_Id FROM product WHERE ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY P_ID desc
mapper.update: UPDATE product SET p_content = #{p_Content} WHERE p_id = #{p_Id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_STOCK (P_ID, P_SIZE, P_COLOR, P_COUNT) VALUES (#{p_Id}, #{p_Size}, #{p_Color}, #{p_Count})
